commitResults.messageTitle: Implemented skeletal version of Duke. Echo commands and exit on "bye" command
Implemented Add and List. Created DukeList class to encapsulate the list structure
Removed DukeList.java, shifted all functionality to Duke Added Task to encapsulate individual task Added Mark/Unmark functionality
Added ToDos, Deadlines and Events
Changed to ArrayList
Added borders to Duke Added input and expected results for automated
Fixed bugs. Added Error handling for most inputs.
Added Delete function Update test cases for automated testing.
Modified error message and implementation.
Updated Duke implementation
Fix bugs
Deadline class: fix error handling bugs
Duke class: Fix string formatting bug
Add javadocs and comments Change most attributes/methods to suitable access modifier Fix Duke bug where program does not terminate
Add Storage class to support saving tasks to hard disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are refreshed when Duke starts up. No information can be stored.

Retrieving past tasks should be supported.

Add Storage class to create and manage files storing information of the tasks. Initializes Duke with the initial state of the tasks as per the file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Storage class to support saving tasks to hard disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are refreshed when Duke starts up. No information can be stored.

Retrieving past tasks should be supported.

Add Storage class to create and manage files storing information of the tasks. Initializes Duke with the initial state of the tasks as per the file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Parser class to handle date and time
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke initially treats all time frame as String only.

Supports date and time for greater utility.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add TaskList class to abstract task manager
Add Command class to abstract each command execution
Add Parser class to parse user inputs
commitResults.messageBody:
All user inputs were handled by Duke class. Code is messy and difficult to debug

Creates Parser class to manage user inputs and handle errors, also supports formatting of date/time

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bugs regarding exception handling of user inputs
Add MaybeDate class to abstract the time frame of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Events with time frame either only support Strings or only support LocalDateTime

Support both versions by creating MaybeDate and modify other dependent classes to support the change.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Ui class to deal with interactions with users
commitResults.messageBody:
Ui class is not functional and each class interacted with the user by themselves

Ui class allows interactions with users to be centralized at one point. Easier management of code.

Let's move all print functions from other classes to Ui.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit test with Gradle support
commitResults.messageBody:
Manual unit testing is inefficient.

Automate testing with JUnit.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move classes into duke package
